duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct quality assurance site inspections and analysis to identify deficiencies and trends in gas operations.
Collaborate with gas operations team to execute annual Quality Assurance work plan.
Liaise with various organizations to build capabilities and support safety and quality awareness.
Promote safe team working and development to achieve business objectives and improve performance.
Analyze safety and compliance inspection/audit data to recognize patterns or trends.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related technical discipline. Minimum 5 years field experience in natural gas industry.
